src:
Boks bo‘yicha O‘zbekiston terma jamoasi Kubaga jo‘nab ketdi

06 Nov 2019, 15:48

Boks bo‘yicha O‘zbekiston terma jamoasi 5-noyabr, seshanba kuni Kubaning Gavana shahriga jo‘nab ketdi.


Foto: MOQ

Terma jamoa ushbu shaharda 23-noyabrga qadar o‘quv-mashg‘ulot yig‘inini o‘tkazadi. Mazkur yig‘in Kuba terma jamoasi bilan o‘tkazilishi rejalashtirilgan bo‘lib, unda o‘zbekistonlik bokschilar mezbonlar bilan sparring janglarida ringga ko‘tariladi.
Kubaga jo‘nab ketgan bokschilar tarkibi esa quyidagicha:
Shahobiddin ZoirovAbrorjon QodirovMiraziz MirzahalilovAbdumalik HalakovOtabek XolmatovElnur AbduraimovShunqor AbdurasulovIqboljon HoldorovBobousmon BoturovIsroil MadrimovFanat QahramonovDilshod Ro‘zmetovJahongir RahmonovSanjar TursunovKozimbek MardonovMadiyor SaidrahimovBahodir JalolovUlug‘bek MubinovJamshid XudoyberganovAsadxo‘ja Mo‘ydinxo‘jayevTemur Saidov

Yanada ko‘proq futbol va sport yangiliklaridan boxabar bo‘lishni istasangiz, “Daryo”ning Telegram’dagi rasmiy sport kanali — @daryo_sport’ga obuna bo‘ling!
text:
Uzbekistan national boxing team leaves for Cuba

06 Nov 2019, 15:48

Uzbekistan national boxing team leaves for Cuba on Tuesday, November 5.


Photo: NOC

The national team will hold a training camp in the city until November 23. The match is scheduled to take place in Cuba, where Uzbek boxers will face the hosts in sparring matches.
The following is the list of boxers left for Cuba:
Shahobiddin ZoirovAbrorjon QodirovMiraziz MirzahalilovAbdumalik HalakovOtabek XolmatovElnur AbduraimovShunqor AbdurasulovIqboljon HoldorovBobousmon BoturovIsroil MadrimovFanat QahramonovDilshod Ro'zmetovJahongir RahmonovSanjar TursunovKozimbek MardonovMadiyor SaidrahimovBahodir JalolovUlug'bek MubinovJamshid XudoyberganovAsadxo'ja Mo'ydinxo'jayevTemur Saidov
